lines.name: Horned Scarab of Awakening

explicitModifiers.text: You can select one Imbued crafting option on the Map Device

lines.flavourText: The Atlas can be anything you want... and everything you want.

lines.name: Horned Scarab of Preservation

explicitModifiers.text: Other Scarabs are not consumed on use

lines.flavourText: We must not forget those who came before.

lines.name: Ambush Scarab of Containment

explicitModifiers.text:
Area contains many additional Strongboxes
Area's inhabitants are lying in ambush

lines.flavourText: The silence belies lurking doom.

lines.name: Ultimatum Scarab of Catalysing

explicitModifiers.text:
Ultimatum Encounters in Area will only offer Catalysts
as Rewards to the Map Owner

lines.flavourText: Most regret finding out how the powder is made.

lines.name: Horned Scarab of Bloodlines

explicitModifiers.text: Area has 150% increased Magic Monsters

lines.flavourText: Only the hardiest survive. Only survivors perpetuate.

lines.name: Harvest Scarab of Cornucopia

explicitModifiers.text: If Area contains the Sacred Grove, it will contain up to 1 additional Tier 4 seed of each type, if possible

lines.flavourText: The taller the tree, the better the fruit.

lines.name: Blight Scarab of Invigoration

explicitModifiers.text:
Each Empowering Tower in Areas grants Blighted Monsters in
range increased Difficulty and Reward

lines.flavourText: Reversing the polarity of the compression modulator seems to have intriguing effects...

lines.name: Essence Scarab of Calcification

explicitModifiers.text: Rare monsters that are natural inhabitants of the Area are imprisoned by Essences

lines.flavourText: The crystals... can spread?

lines.name: Horned Scarab of Pandemonium

explicitModifiers.text:
Monster packs in Area have a 15% chance to be replaced by a random Atlas Boss
Modifiers to the Final Map Boss also apply to these Atlas Bosses

lines.flavourText: Punctured dreams bleed into the mind.

lines.name: Domination Scarab of Terrors

explicitModifiers.text:
Shrines in Area are guarded by an Atlas Boss
Modifiers to the Final Map Boss also apply to these Atlas Bosses

lines.flavourText: Whatever the prize, fight for it.

lines.name: Blight Scarab of Blooming

explicitModifiers.text:
Blight Encounters in Area have up to 3 additional Unique Bosses
Unique enemies in Blight Encounters have 100% increased life
Tier 14+ Blighted Maps found in Area drop as Blight-Ravaged Maps instead

lines.flavourText: Once a century, the Blight spills forth...

lines.name: Divination Scarab of Pilfering

explicitModifiers.text:
Divination Cards which drop in Area are stolen by a Final Map Boss
That Final Map Boss becomes more Difficult and deals
increased Damage the more Divination Cards they have stolen
That Final Map Boss duplicates all stolen Divination Cards when defeated

lines.flavourText: If you do not seize your fate, someone else will.

lines.name: Cartography Scarab of Risk

explicitModifiers.text: Area has 2 additional random Modifiers

lines.flavourText: What we see in the mirror can only be our own reflection.

lines.name: Incursion Scarab of Timelines

explicitModifiers.text:
Final Architect slain in Area will drop an Itemised Temple
 Itemised Temples dropped in Area are generated based on current Temple layout, but with randomised room tiers

lines.flavourText: They say if you go far enough, you will meet yourself...

lines.name: Incursion Scarab of Champions

explicitModifiers.text:
Incursions in Area have a 35% chance for all Monsters to be at least Magic
Incursions in Area have 15% increased Pack Size

lines.flavourText: Only the best served in Atzoatl.

lines.name: Harvest Scarab of Doubling

explicitModifiers.text:
Lifeforce dropped by Harvest Monsters in Area is duplicated
Harvest Monsters in Area have 100% more Life

lines.flavourText: A good season brings bounty.

lines.name: Delirium Scarab of Paranoia

explicitModifiers.text: Delirium Encounters in Area generate 2 additional Reward types

lines.flavourText: If it seems too good to be true...

lines.name: Ritual Scarab of Abundance

explicitModifiers.text: Rituals in Area offer 100% increased Favours

lines.flavourText: He draws ever closer...

lines.name: Breach Scarab of Snares

explicitModifiers.text:
Breaches in Area have 3 to 5 additional Clasped Hands
Clasped Hands in Area are guarded by a rare Breach Monster

lines.flavourText: Care where you step.

lines.name: Horned Scarab of Glittering

explicitModifiers.text:
Players in Area gain increased Item Rarity for each Monster
slain, up to 400%, decaying over time

lines.flavourText: Wealth flows to those that shine brightest.

lines.name: Kalguuran Scarab of Refinement

explicitModifiers.text: Ore Deposits in Area grant Smelted Bars instead of Marking Ore

lines.flavourText: Ore's true worth lies not in stone, but in what it becomes.

lines.name: Scarab of Wisps

explicitModifiers.text: Monsters in Area have a chance to be Empowered by 2000 Wildwood Wisps

lines.flavourText: The Draíocht connects everything that lives.

lines.name: Harbinger Scarab of Regency

explicitModifiers.text: Harbingers in Area have a 50% chance to be replaced by a powerful Harbinger Boss

lines.flavourText: The truly noble wage war from the front.

lines.name: Harbinger Scarab of Warhoards

explicitModifiers.text: Currency shards dropped by Harbingers in Area are duplicated

lines.flavourText: For those who can leverage it, war can be as much a machine of profit as it is death.

lines.name: Ultimatum Scarab of Dueling

explicitModifiers.text: Ultimatum Encounters in Area will always lead to a Unique Boss if possible

lines.flavourText: Victory is meaningless, failure will be mocked.

lines.name: Essence Scarab of Adaptation

explicitModifiers.text:
Imprisoned Monsters released in Areas grant a random Essence Modifier to another Imprisoned Monster in the Area
Imprisoned Monsters in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for
each Essence Modifier

lines.flavourText: The crystalline lattice expands in directions alien to the mortal mind.

lines.name: Breach Scarab of Resonant Cascade

explicitModifiers.text:
Breaches in Areas open and close 10% faster for each Breach already opened
Monsters from Breaches in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for
each Breach already opened

lines.flavourText: Reality weakens with each new wound.

lines.name: Domination Scarab of Evolution

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains an additional Evolving Shrine

lines.flavourText: The Atlas and Wraeclast share one terrifying secret.

lines.name: Divination Scarab of The Cloister

explicitModifiers.text:
Area contains 8 to 12 additional packs of Doedre's Devoted
Doedre's Devoted have 1% additional chance to drop a Stacked Deck

lines.flavourText: No disease can be contained forever.

lines.name: Abyss Scarab of Edifice

explicitModifiers.text:
Abysses in Area that do not lead to an Abyssal Depths lead to a Stygian Spire
Abysses in Area spawn Hoards as they travel

lines.flavourText: Their empires ghastly and gaunt glitter with gold.

lines.name: Bestiary Scarab of Duplicating

explicitModifiers.text: Create a copy of Beasts captured in Area

lines.flavourText: "What's better than one captured beast, exile?"

lines.name: Beyond Scarab of the Invasion

explicitModifiers.text: Rare and Unique Monsters slain in Area create 8 to 12 additional Beyond Portals

lines.flavourText: The fated hour is almost nigh.

lines.name: Legion Scarab of Eternal Conflict

explicitModifiers.text:
Legion Monsters in Area can be broken out of Stasis multiple times
Legion Monsters in Area gain increased Difficulty and Reward for each time they are broken out

lines.flavourText: An eternity of blood. Glorious.

lines.name: Abyss Scarab of Profound Depth

explicitModifiers.text:
Monsters from Abysses in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for
each prior Pit in that Abyss

lines.flavourText: The deeper we dig, the more we find, be it fortune or foe.

lines.name: Breach Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains 2 additional Breaches

lines.flavourText: They are never far.

lines.name: Delirium Scarab of Mania

explicitModifiers.text:
Delirium Reward Meters fill 100% faster in Area
Delirium in Area increases 50% faster with distance from the mirror

lines.flavourText:
They're so loud! Why are they so loud?!
All you can do is scream!

lines.name: Bestiary Scarab of the Herd

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains 5 additional Red Beasts if it contains Einhar

lines.flavourText: The First Ones ran rampant and free in the forests of old.

lines.name: Horned Scarab of Tradition

explicitModifiers.text:
All Rare and Unique Monsters in Area have dropped items
transformed by a Reward Modifier

lines.flavourText: To the strongest, prosperity be thine.

lines.name: Scarab of Radiant Storms

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains a Resplendent Tempest

lines.flavourText: The great cacophony of life roars to a crescendo.

lines.name: Kalguuran Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains an additional Ore Deposit

lines.flavourText: Rich veins run deeper still.

lines.name: Cartography Scarab of Corruption

explicitModifiers.text: Non-Unique Maps found in Area are Corrupted with 8 Modifiers

lines.flavourText: Corruption bleeds between realities.

lines.name: Divination Scarab of Plenty

explicitModifiers.text:
Area contains 6 to 10 additional Packs of Divination Touched Magic Monsters that
have 1000% increased chance to drop Divination Cards

lines.flavourText: We create a thousand futures with every action.

lines.name: Ambush Scarab of Discernment

explicitModifiers.text: Strongboxes in Area are more likely to be rarer varieties

lines.flavourText: A keen eye sorts the worthy from the chaff.

lines.name: Essence Scarab of Ascent

explicitModifiers.text: Essences found in Area are a tier higher

lines.flavourText: A more perfect facet cannot be achieved.

lines.name: Blight Scarab of the Blightheart

explicitModifiers.text:
Blight Encounters in Area have one Blighted Chest
Blight Encounters in Area spawn many more waves of Enemies
Blighted Chests in Area grow larger and more
rewarding the more Blighted Enemies are slain

lines.flavourText: The core grows larger with each cycle, doomed to spill forth...

lines.name: Harbinger Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains 3 additional Harbingers

lines.flavourText: Their troops came in numbers uncountable and from lands unknown.

lines.name: Horned Scarab of Nemeses

explicitModifiers.text: Rare Monsters in Area have 2 additional Modifiers

lines.flavourText: Glory draws ever tighter its own doom.

lines.name: Ritual Scarab of Selectiveness

explicitModifiers.text:
Rerolling Favours at Ritual Altars in Area has no cost the first 2 times
Ritual Altars in Area allow rerolling Favours 1 additional time

lines.flavourText: Pick and choose which sacred tenets you prefer...

lines.name: Scarab of Monstrous Lineage

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Magic Pack Size

lines.flavourText: The bloodlines evolve faster than they can be culled.

lines.name: Influencing Scarab of Conversion

explicitModifiers.text: Tier 14+ Maps found in Area have a chance to drop as Shaper Guardian, Elder Guardian, Conqueror or Unique Synthesised Maps instead

lines.flavourText: Memories resound in the Atlas, echoing forever.

lines.name: Delirium Scarab of Neuroses

explicitModifiers.text:
Delirium Encounters in Area contain all Unique Delirium Bosses
Can only be used with Tier 11+ Maps

lines.flavourText: Toothy grins shine in the dark.

lines.name: Legion Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains an additional Legion Encounter

lines.flavourText: What good is peace to a warrior?

lines.name: Expedition Scarab of Verisium Powder

explicitModifiers.text:
Expedition Encounters in Area have 50% increased number of Explosives
80% increased Explosive Radius

lines.flavourText: A properly refined pinch makes all the difference.

lines.name: Legion Scarab of Command

explicitModifiers.text: Legion Factions in Area are accompanied by a General

lines.flavourText: Cut off the head and the snake will perish.

lines.name: Breach Scarab of Splintering

explicitModifiers.text:
Breach Monsters in Area drop 50% more Breach Splinters
Clasped Hands in Area drop 50% more Breach Splinters

lines.flavourText: Bit by bit.

lines.name: Anarchy Scarab of Gigantification

explicitModifiers.text: Wild Rogue Exiles in Area have a 30% chance to be replaced with a Rogue Giant

lines.flavourText: The consumption of sulphite can cause strange growth.

lines.name: Ultimatum Scarab of Bribing

explicitModifiers.text:
Ultimatum Monsters grant 150% increased Experience
Ultimatum Encounters grant rewards as though you completed 2 additional Rounds

lines.flavourText: A trial is only as incorruptible as its judge.

lines.name: Breach Scarab of Lordship

explicitModifiers.text: Breaches in Area each contain a Breachlord

lines.flavourText: Their kingdoms always seek expansion.

lines.name: Influencing Scarab of Hordes

explicitModifiers.text: Influenced Monster Packs in Area have 40% increased Pack Size

lines.flavourText: Ideas cannot be contained.

lines.name: Expedition Scarab of Runefinding

explicitModifiers.text:
Expedition Encounters in Area have 100% increased
number of Runic Monster Markers

lines.flavourText: That which came from the stars longs to return.

lines.name: Anarchy Scarab of Partnership

explicitModifiers.text: Wild Rogue Exiles in Area have a 50% chance to appear in pairs

lines.flavourText: Among exiles, alliances shift and change constantly.

lines.name: Delirium Scarab of Delusions

explicitModifiers.text: Maps found in Area have layers of Delirium

lines.flavourText:
What are you talking about?
The Atlas was always like this.

lines.name: Ultimatum Scarab of Inscription

explicitModifiers.text:
Ultimatum Encounter rewards in Area offering Catalysts
will offer Inscribed Ultimatums to the Map Owner instead

lines.flavourText: There is always a wager to be made... if you can afford it.

lines.name: Expedition Scarab of Archaeology

explicitModifiers.text: Remnants in Expedition Encounters in Area have 2 additional Suffixes and Prefixes

lines.flavourText: Curiosity leads to wisdom. Wisdom leads to power.

lines.name: Beyond Scarab of Resurgence

explicitModifiers.text:
Beyond Bosses in Area are enraged on low life
Beyond Bosses in Area drop 100% increased Tainted Currency
Beyond Portals in Area have 30% increased chance to spawn a Unique Boss

lines.flavourText: They hunger.

lines.name: Scarab of Stability

explicitModifiers.text: Portals to Area have a 50% chance to not be consumed on use

lines.flavourText: Astonishing! A means to sustain the connection...

lines.name: Legion Scarab of Officers

explicitModifiers.text: Legion Factions in Area have 5 additional Sergeants

lines.flavourText: Even a battlefield has middle management.

lines.name: Torment Scarab of Possession

explicitModifiers.text: Rare Monsters in Area have a quarter chance to be Possessed by up to 1 Tormented Spirit

lines.flavourText: The strong are never truly alone.

lines.name: Cartography Scarab of the Multitude

explicitModifiers.text:
Area contains 8 to 12 additional packs of
Difficult and Rewarding Monsters which drop 300% increased Maps

lines.flavourText: There is no end, no horizon.

lines.name: Ritual Scarab of Wisps

explicitModifiers.text:
Ritual Altars in Area spawn a Wildwood Wisp
Wildwood Wisps grant 100% increased Tribute Gained to nearby Players

lines.flavourText: Trust in the Draíocht, and you shall never be alone.

lines.name: Titanic Scarab of Legend

explicitModifiers.text: Unique Monsters in Area have 2 additional Monster Modifiers

lines.flavourText: Power accumulates.

lines.name: Titanic Scarab of Treasures

explicitModifiers.text:
Unique Monsters in Area have an additional Reward
Unique Monsters in Area have 30% increased Toughness

lines.flavourText: Greed is a trap of the mind.

lines.name: Scarab of Bisection

explicitModifiers.text: You can select the Nullify Prefixes or Nullify Suffixes crafting options on the Map Device

lines.flavourText: When something is cut in half, which half is the original?

lines.name: Harbinger Scarab of Obelisks

explicitModifiers.text:
Harbingers in Area spawn Empowered Obelisks
Empowered Obelisks drop Currency Shards when defeated

lines.flavourText: They seek to establish an unknown pattern.

lines.name: Betrayal Scarab of Reinforcements

explicitModifiers.text: Immortal Syndicate Members in Area have 50% increased chance to be accompanied by reinforcements

lines.flavourText: Move and countermove.

lines.name: Sulphite Scarab of Fumes

explicitModifiers.text:
Sulphite found in Map Area releases Enraging Fumes
Monsters affected by Enraging Fumes have 50% increased Item Quantity
Sulphite in your maps is guarded by Monsters from the Azurite Mine

lines.flavourText: When the land itself is sick, even the very ground rots and spills forth.

lines.name: Kalguuran Scarab of Guarded Riches

explicitModifiers.text: Monsters guarding Ore Deposits in Area are at least Magic

lines.flavourText: Digging's the easy part.

lines.name: Delirium Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains a Mirror of Delirium

lines.flavourText: A perfectly innocuous Scarab that does nothing at all.

lines.name: Expedition Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains an Expedition Encounter

lines.flavourText: They come from across the sea in search of ancient truth.

lines.name: Essence Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains 2 additional Imprisoned Monsters

lines.flavourText: It is perfectly safe, the creatures trapped inside couldn't possibly still be living.

lines.name: Abyss Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains an additional Abyss

lines.flavourText: They search forever for more souls to drag to the dark.

lines.name: Domination Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains 2 additional Shrines

lines.flavourText: A simple exchange. Blood for power.

lines.name: Sulphite Scarab

explicitModifiers.text:
Area contains Niko
Map owner gains 150% more Sulphite

lines.flavourText: Delve into darkness in search of the truth...

lines.name: Essence Scarab of Stability

explicitModifiers.text:
Using a Remnant of Corruption in Area can only result in
upgrading or transforming Essences

lines.flavourText:
With the right tools and a precise hand, the manipulation of the crystals
can be made predictable.

lines.name: Ambush Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains 3 additional Strongboxes

lines.flavourText: Is it still an ambush if you're expecting it?

lines.name: Beyond Scarab of Haemophilia

explicitModifiers.text: Beyond Portals in Area have 50% increased Merging Radius

lines.flavourText: Reality itself begins to bleed.

lines.name: Ambush Scarab of Hidden Compartments

explicitModifiers.text: 15% Chance for Strongboxes in Area to be openable again

lines.flavourText: Beneath the obvious lies the real treasure...

lines.name: Scarab of Hunted Traitors

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains Hunted Traitors

lines.flavourText: Nothing is as unforgiveable.

lines.name: Scarab of Divinity

explicitModifiers.text:
Up to 2 additional Rare Monsters in Area will be Pantheon-Touched
Apparitions spawned by Pantheon-Touched Monsters deal 100% increased damage

lines.flavourText: Faith transforms.

lines.name: Cartography Scarab of Escalation

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Maps found in Area for each Map Modifier affecting Area

lines.flavourText: Opportunity thrives where dreams are most perilous.

lines.name: Torment Scarab of Peculiarity

explicitModifiers.text: Tormented Spirits in Area are replaced with unusual variants

lines.flavourText: Now there's a blood-curdling wail I haven't heard before!

lines.name: Ambush Scarab of Potency

explicitModifiers.text: 75% Increased effect of Explicit Modifiers on Strongboxes in Area

lines.flavourText: The locksmith dreams of building a better box.

lines.name: Scarab of Adversaries

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains 4 additional Packs with Mirrored Rare Monsters

lines.flavourText: They stand against you with equal enmity.

lines.name: Domination Scarab of Apparitions

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains 2 additional Apparition Shrines

lines.flavourText: Some paths to power lead only to madness.

lines.name: Abyss Scarab of Multitudes

explicitModifiers.text: Abysses in Area spawn 50% increased Monsters

lines.flavourText: They ceaselessly sprout from the murderous earth.

lines.name: Titanic Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Unique Monsters have 1% increased Toughness, Damage, Rarity and Quantity of items dropped per 1% increased Pack Size of Area

lines.flavourText: What power lies in a name?

lines.name: Anarchy Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains 4 additional Rogue Exiles

lines.flavourText: On Wraeclast, it's kill or be killed.

lines.name: Harvest Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains the Sacred Grove

lines.flavourText: Hidden routes lead to vales of shadow and light...

lines.name: Beyond Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Slaying enemies close together in Area can attract monsters from Beyond this realm

lines.flavourText: The silent wall and the raging storm oppose the endless swarm.

lines.name: Torment Scarab

explicitModifiers.text:
Area is haunted by 3 additional Tormented Spirits
Tormented Spirits in Area have a 25% chance to
be set free when Possessed Monsters are slain

lines.flavourText: Their crimes in life haunt you in death.

lines.name: Blight Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains a Blight Encounter

lines.flavourText: The tendrils creep and grow...

lines.name: Incursion Scarab of Invasion

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains 12 to 16 additional packs of Incursion Monsters

lines.flavourText: A gate, once opened, may swing in either direction.

lines.name: Influencing Scarab of the Elder

explicitModifiers.text: Adds Elder Influence outcome to Area

lines.flavourText: Beyond the light lies only the void.

lines.name: Ultimatum Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains an Ultimatum Encounter

lines.flavourText: A challenge may be requested at any time.

lines.name: Betrayal Scarab of the Allflame

explicitModifiers.text: 75% Increased number of Monster Packs Substituted by Allflame Embers in Area

lines.flavourText: Those that can never die fear only pain.

lines.name: Influencing Scarab of the Shaper

explicitModifiers.text: Adds Shaper Influence outcome to Area

lines.flavourText: A sea of stars awaits those who dare imagine.

lines.name: Bestiary Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains Einhar

lines.flavourText: The Beastmaster answers the call.

lines.name: Betrayal Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains Jun

lines.flavourText: The Syndicate must pay for what they have done.

lines.name: Incursion Scarab

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains Alva

lines.flavourText: Uncover the secrets of the Vaal one incursion at a time.
